member.name: T:Waher.Networking.BinaryTcpClient
member.summary: Implements a binary TCP Client, by encapsulating a . It also makes the use of safe, making sure it can be disposed, even during an active connection attempt. Outgoing data is queued and transmitted in the permitted pace.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Sniffers.TextFileSniffer
member.summary: Outputs sniffed data to a text file.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Sniffers.TextFileSniffer.#ctor(System.String,Waher.Networking.Sniffers.BinaryPresentationMethod)
member.summary: Outputs sniffed data to a text file.
member.param:
File Name. The following strings will be replaced by current values:
%YEAR% = Current year. %MONTH% = Current month. %DAY% = Current day. %HOUR% = Current hour. %MINUTE% = Current minute. %SECOND% = Current second.
NOTE: Make sure files are stored in a separate folder, as old files will be automatically deleted.
How binary data is to be presented.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Sniffers.TextFileSniffer.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,Waher.Networking.Sniffers.BinaryPresentationMethod)
member.summary: Outputs sniffed data to a text file.
member.param:
File Name. The following strings will be replaced by current values:
%YEAR% = Current year. %MONTH% = Current month. %DAY% = Current day. %HOUR% = Current hour. %MINUTE% = Current minute. %SECOND% = Current second.
NOTE: Make sure files are stored in a separate folder, as old files will be automatically deleted.
Number of days files will be kept. All files older than this in the corresponding folder will be removed. Default value is 7 days.
How binary data is to be presented.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Sniffers.TextFileSniffer.BeforeWrite
member.summary: Method is called before writing something to the text file.

member.summary: Method is called after writing something to the text file.
